docs.snippet: Donald Trump's statement that Russian President Vladimir Putin enjoys an 82 percent approval rating among his people wasn't hyperbole. Russia's two main polling agencies consistently give the man in the Kremlin ratings that would be the envy of Tr...
docs.lead_paragraph: Donald Trump's statement that Russian President Vladimir Putin enjoys an 82 percent approval rating among his people wasn't hyperbole. Russia's two main polling agencies consistently give the man in the Kremlin ratings that would be the envy of Trump or his rival in the U.S. presidential election, Hillary Clinton.

headline.main: Putin's Popularity: The Envy of Other Politicians
headline.print_headline: Putin's Popularity: The Envy of Other Politicians

docs.snippet: President Barack Obama said Thursday that Republican Donald Trump proves he isn't qualified to be president "every time he speaks," adding that he is confident Americans will ultimately reject the brash billionaire on Election Day....
docs.lead_paragraph: President Barack Obama said Thursday that Republican Donald Trump proves he isn't qualified to be president "every time he speaks," adding that he is confident Americans will ultimately reject the brash billionaire on Election Day.

headline.main: Obama: Americans Will Reject Trump's 'Wacky' Ideas
headline.print_headline: Obama: Americans Will Reject Trump's 'Wacky' Ideas

docs.snippet: More than health care, race or the economy, Mr. Obama believes his efforts to slow global warming will be the most consequential legacy of his presidency....
docs.lead_paragraph: More than health care, race or the economy, Mr. Obama believes his efforts to slow global warming will be the most consequential legacy of his presidency.
docs.abstract: Interview with Pres Obama reveals extent to which he believes his legacy will be determined by what he has accomplished in fight against climate change; issue has not only showed heights of Obama's ambition, but also exposed some of his weaknesses, like inability to forge consensus even within his own party about best ways to tackle problem (Series: The Obama Era).

headline.main: Obama on Climate Change: The Trends Are ‘Terrifying’
headline.print_headline: ‘Terrifying’ Path of Climate Crisis Weighs on Obama
